questions.question: How do I scan my Petro-Points barcode in the App?
questions.response: Please go in-store to scan the barcode in the App.

questions.question: How do I reload my Fuel Savings Reward card?
questions.response: Soon you’ll be able to reload your card in the App, but for now please visit petro-points.com.

questions.question: How do I reload my Wash & Go card or Season Pass?
questions.response: Soon you’ll be able to reload your cards in the App, but for now please visit petro-points.com.

questions.question: How do I add my partner card to my Petro-Points account (i.e. CAA, More Rewards)?
questions.response: Soon you’ll be able to add your partner cards in the App, but for now please visit petro-points.com.

questions.question: Can I redeem my points using the App?
questions.response: For now you need to swipe your actual card or go online to redeem your points, but we’re working on it.
